title: Sync issues : Listening for regular sync messages from peers
body:
Facing sync issues with beacon-chain (commit : dd131561b) . Initially tried to sync overnight, but it hung forever. Here is a log when trying to sync for 15mn. 

```[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  WARN blockchain: Processed 6113 skipped slots
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO core/state: Block attestations attestationsInBlock=0
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO core/state: Block deposits depositsInBlock=0
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO core/state: Applying quadratic leak penalties epochSinceFinality=768
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO core/state: Number of current epoch attestations currentEpochAttestations=0
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO core/state: Number of previous epoch attestations prevEpochAttestations=0
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO core/state: Number of previous epoch boundary attestations prevEpochBoundaryAttestations=0
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO core/state: Previous justified epoch previousJustifiedEpoch=33796
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO core/state: Justified epoch justifiedEpoch=33796
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO core/state: Finalized epoch finalizedEpoch=33794
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO core/state: Validator Registry Update Epoch validatorRegistryUpdateEpoch=33796
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO core/state: Validator registry length numValidators=698
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO core/state: Active validators activeValidators=512
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO core/state: Active validator balances averageBalance=3.77501 highestBalance=3.8485572 lowestBalance=3.6889749
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO blockchain: Slot transition successfully processed slotsSinceGenesis=276495
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO blockchain: Block transition successfully processed slotsSinceGenesis=276495
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO blockchain: Epoch transition successfully processed SlotsSinceGenesis=276495
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO initial-sync: Exiting init sync and starting regular sync canonicalStateSlot=276495
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO initial-sync: Synced!
[2019-06-16 16:51:45]  INFO regular-sync: Listening for regular sync messages from peers
^C[2019-06-16 17:05:43]  INFO node: Got interrupt, shutting down...
[2019-06-16 17:05:43]  INFO node: Stopping beacon node
[2019-06-16 17:05:43]  INFO prometheus: Stopping service
[2019-06-16 17:05:43]  INFO rpc: Stopping service
[2019-06-16 17:05:43]  INFO syncQuerier: Stopping service
[2019-06-16 17:05:43]  INFO initial-sync: Stopping service
[2019-06-16 17:05:43]  INFO regular-sync: Stopping service
[2019-06-16 17:05:43]  INFO blockchain: Stopping service
[2019-06-16 17:05:43]  INFO operation: Stopping service
[2019-06-16 17:05:43]  INFO attestation: Stopping service
[2019-06-16 17:05:43]  INFO powchain: Stopping service
[2019-06-16 17:05:43]  INFO p2p: Stopping service

@jbriquet The chain was actually stalled at that time so no blocks were being produced. 

We've reset testnet and redeployed a new contract to use since then. If you give this another go, it should be working for you, but please reopen if still having issues. Thanks!
